titles.title: To prohibit the use of funds to develop, test, deploy, implement, or administer the Disability Case Processing System, and for other purposes.
To prohibit the use of funds to develop, test, deploy, implement, or administer the Disability Case Processing System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the Social Security Administration from using funds to develop, test, deploy, implement, or administer the Disability Case Processing System or any similar program unless authorized to do so by Congress.
